messages.title: United4Labour
messages.content:
With the likely General Election a matter of weeks away we wanted to keep in touch with you to urge you to support Labour.
The election will be the most important since 1997. It is a clear choice between Labour and the Conservatives.

issues.economy: The Conservatives have driven the economy from around 15 points last year to 5 points
issues.governance: The Conservatives have begun to unravel as their policies and ideas come under scrutiny. The opinion polls reflect the fragile recovery that David Cameron and the underfunded ideas spending cuts he plans will wreck.
